blueprint.description: Installs htop (an interactive terminal-based process viewer) on Linux and macOS
blueprint.overview: [htop](https://htop.dev/) is an interactive system-monitor process-viewer and process-manager. It is designed as an alternative to the Unix program top. It shows a frequently updated list of the processes running on a computer, normally ordered by the amount of CPU usage.
blueprint.name: htop
blueprint.title: htop
